name: Awesome WordPress Author Bio
author: Jewel Theme

sections.description:
Best WordPress Author Bio Plugin. No need extra configurations. Just install > Active and Enjoy. Awesome Author Bio Plugin allows to create unlimited Possibilities of Customizations. Awesome WP Author Bio plugin doesn’t require any Shortcodes or any kind of Installation Process. Just Install this Plugin and it will automatically gets the Styles and Configurations for the Plugin Admin Panel. It suits any kind of Free and Premium WordPress Themes.

Features Included

  • Shows in Post/Pages or Both
  • Avatar Type – Square or Rounded
  • Avatar Size Define
  • Background Color Change Option
  • Social Icons – Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Linkedin, Google Plus, Thumblr, Flickr, Instagram, Dribbble,
  • Recent Post Tab – Post Title Length, Show Post Items, Show Comments etc
  • Recent Comments Tab – Post Title Length, Show Post Items etc
  • Many more settings are comming!!!

Comments, Feedback and Request Features

Please give your valueable suggestions, comments, and feedbacks about this plugin or, any ideas about WordPress Plugin just drop a message to us. We are waiting for hearing from you!!!

sections.installation:
• From WordPress Dashboard go to “Plugins>> Add New>> Uploads”, select ‘wp-author-bio.zip’ file and upload it. Or,
  • Extract the zip file, copy and paste to the ‘wp-conten/plugins/’ directory of your WordPress Installation.
  • Activate the plugin.
  • Author Bio
